t: Amazon.com: DKONI Ski Helmet, Snowboard Helmet for Men & Women, Three-Stage Adjustable Ventilation System, Adjustable Fit, Durable PC Shell, Protective EPS Foam, Snow Sports Helmet for Adults, Youth & Kids : Sports & Outdoors
s: We ski/board a ton and just got back from an epic Colorado powder vacation. This Dkoni helmet is basically generic, very inexpensive at under $40.. but holds it's own in regards to overall feel, warmth, protection and aesthetics compared to the name brand $75-$150 helmets.
